title: Steel and Metal BIM specialist
job_overview:
What You’ll Be Doing:

-Develop accurate 3D BIM models and 2D technical drawings using Revit, AutoCAD, Fusion 360, and similar software.
-Translate site surveys and architectural/structural plans into practical, constructible designs.
-Prepare shop drawings, part lists, and complete assembly documentation for fabrication.
-Work closely with architects, engineers, and the broader project team to ensure alignment and accuracy.
-Perform quality assurance checks to maintain compliance with material specifications and industry standards.
-Support clash detection processes, manage model coordination, and maintain a well-organized library of 3D families and templates.
-Stay current with BIUpgrade to see actual infothodologies and trends in steel design and fabrication.

What We’re Looking For:
-3–5 years of experience in drafting or BIM roles, ideally within steel or metal fabrication.
-Solid understanding of steel detailing, construction techniques, and manufacturing processes.
-Skilled in Revit, AutoCAD, Fusion 360; familiarity with SketchUp is a bonus.
-Proven experience creating shop drawings, fabrication-ready documents, and installation packages.
-Strong communication skills and the ability to manage time and collaborate effectively in a team setting.
-Knowledge of BIM coordination standards and quality control procedures.
=Detail-focused, self-motivated, and genuinely passionate about digital construction workflows.

 Compensation:
Salary range: ?30,000–?45,000, depending on experience and qualifications.

How to Apply:
If you're passionate about precision, BIM technology, and steel design, we want to hear from you!

Please send your updated resume and portfolio to: Upgrade to see actual info
Use “Application for BIM Specialist” as your email subject line for consideration.
